subject: Scheduling a Meeting to Discuss Project Updates
body: *Dear Savio* I hope this email finds you well. I would like to schedule a meeting to discuss the recent progress on our ongoing projects and address any updates or concerns. Please let me know your availability for a meeting this week. I’m proposing the following times: - *February 10, 2025* – 10:00 AM to 10:30 AM Kindly confirm which time works best for you, or feel free to suggest any other time if these slots are not suitable. Looking forward to the meeting. Best regards, Jayesh Chaudhari Project Manager, XYZ Company
